divs: Sighting Detailsboth the events of april 24, 2007 and may 21 or 22 , correspond with refueling training exercises conducted from grissom air force base- central indiana- KC 135 super tankers refueling the triangular shaped B-2. perhaps the hose extentions light up too. oh well......now beam me up scotty !!!
